title: Is there anything happening with Riot servers?
body:
There's weird FPS and Ping Spikes. Not only me, but I've seen twitch streamers (Doublelift, Pokimane, etc.) experiencing the same lag.

Is there anything happening with Riot servers or is there a new compatibility issue with Windows 10?

ISP: Cox Communications.

replies.body:
Hmm, nope I wasn't able to see any issues with the servers.  I know Cox had some ISP issues last week for some players, so double check your ISP's support site in case anything might be going down.  Otherwise, if you're having ping spikes then your issue could be isolated down to packet loss.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to be sure.

In the case of the log yielding issues, you can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network.  I hope that helps!
